# joints

**Instance Property**

The set of joints the physics joints component stores.

## Declaration

```swift
var joints: PhysicsJoints
```

## Discussion

Add a joint to the correct [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/PhysicsJointsComponent] instance by calling its `PhysicsJoint/addToSimulation()-886c4` method.
title: joints
